dimensions: Warp x Weft: 322 x 117 cm (10 ft. 6 3/4 in. x 46 1/16 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: plain weave
description: Sample length of a drapery fabric, never produced.  The warp is of orange-red cotton, the weft is of black cotton paired with a very uneven white silk yarn.  The irregularities in the yarn and the manipulation of the black and white yarns in each shed give the effect of a subtly variegated surface.
name: Textile
